Title: TFS Chain Build Template
Description: TFS Chain Build provides a template that invoke other TFS builds from a pre-configured list. There is no need for any kind of customization beside of this XAML.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
TFS Chain Build provides a template that invoke other TFS builds from a pre-configured list. There is no need for any kind of customization beside of this XAML.
The project provides a basic TFS build workflow that creates a chain build. Chain build is one master build that queues other builds from a list that provided by the build process definition.
